bibl.title: Hazzard v. Aguirre and Price. Assignment of Errors.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court of Washington Territory, Second Judicial District

div1.p: to answer the following question propounded by defendants' attorney:

"Mr. Aguirre before leaving Los Angeles with the requisition from the Governor of the State of California did you have any conversation with relation to the identification of the particular George Hazzard referred to in the indictment with the foreman of the Grand Jury that found the indictment or with the prosecuting witness?"
Also error of the Court in permitting the same witness to answer the following question propounded by attorney for defendants:
"Go on and state what that was."
Also error of the Court in permitting the same witness to answer the following question propounded by attorney for defendants:
"Is that the business that Steven told you Hazzard was engaged in at that time?"
Also error of the Court in permitting the same witness to answer the following question propounded by defendants' attorney:
"Is this the George Hazzard;this man ehre, the plaintiff in this Habeas Corpus, the George Hazzard who is wanted in this requisition?"
Error of the Court in rendering final judgment in said cause against plaintiff and in favor of the defendants.
And error of the Court in refusing to grant the petition of plaintiff for discharge.
